sys_data_source.name: PEX - Crew Management - Ctrl Impl2
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT DISTINCT
CREW.STAFFNUMBER AS RE,
CREWONFLIGHT.ACTINGPOSITIONCODE AS CARGO,
INFO.FIRSTNAME AS FIRST_NAME,
INFO.LASTNAME AS LAST_NAME,
EMAIL.EMAIL_VALUE AS EMAIL,
FLIGHTKEY.AIRLINECODE AS EMPRESA,
FLIGHTLEG.DEPARTUREAIRPORTCODE AS ORIGEM,
FLIGHTLEG.ARRIVALAIRPORTCODE AS DESTINO,
FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTNUMBER AS NUMERO_VOO,
FLIGHTLEG.FLIGHTLEGID AS FLIGHTLEGID,
--FLIGHTLEG.UTCFLIGHTDATE AS DTT_PARTIDA__HORARIO_UTC,
LEGTIMES.SCHEDULEDDEPARTURETIMELOC AS DTT_PARTIDA_HORARIO_LOC,
LEGTIMES.SCHEDULEDARRIVALTIMELOC AS DTT_CHEGADA_HORARIO_LOC
--FUNCTION.EFFECTIVEDATE AS DTT_INICIO_CARGO,
--FUNCTION.EXPIRYDATE AS DTT_FIM_CARGO
FROM CREW
JOIN CREWPERSONALINFO INFO ON CREW.ID = INFO.FK_CREW
JOIN CREWEMAIL EMAIL ON CREW.ID = EMAIL.FK_CREW
-- JOIN CREWFUNCTION FUNCTION ON CREW.ID = FUNCTION.FK_CREW
JOIN CREWONFLIGHT ON CREW.STAFFNUMBER = CREWONFLIGHT.STAFFNUMBER
JOIN FLIGHTLEG ON CREWONFLIGHT.FLIGHTLEGID = FLIGHTLEG.FLIGHTLEGID
JOIN FLIGHTLEG_FLIGHTKEY FLIGHTKEY ON FLIGHTLEG.ID = FLIGHTKEY.FK_FLIGHTLEG
JOIN FLIGHTLEGTIMES LEGTIMES ON LEGTIMES.FK_FLIGHTLEG = FLIGHTLEG.ID
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT CREW.STAFFNUMBER,
FLIGHTLEG.DEPARTUREAIRPORTCODE,
FLIGHTLEG.ARRIVALAIRPORTCODE,
FLIGHTKEY.AIRLINECODE,
FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTNUMBER,
FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTDATE
FROM FLIGHTLEGTIMES TIMES
JOIN FLIGHTLEG ON FLIGHTLEG.ID = TIMES.FK_FLIGHTLEG
JOIN FLIGHTLEG_FLIGHTKEY FLIGHTKEY ON FLIGHTLEG.ID = FLIGHTKEY.FK_FLIGHTLEG
JOIN CREWONPAIRING_FLIGHTLEG CREWFLIGHT ON CREWFLIGHT.FLIGHTLEGID = FLIGHTLEG.FLIGHTLEGID
JOIN CREWONPAIRING ON CREWONPAIRING.ID = CREWFLIGHT.FK_CREWONPAIRING
JOIN CREWONPAIRING_CREW CREW ON CREWONPAIRING.ID = CREW.FK_CREWONPAIRING
JOIN CREWONFLIGHT ON CREW.STAFFNUMBER = CREWONFLIGHT.STAFFNUMBER
JOIN PAIRING ON CREWONPAIRING.PATTERNLABEL = PAIRING.PATTERNLABEL
JOIN PAIRING_DUTY DUTY ON PAIRING.ID = DUTY.FK_PAIRING
JOIN DUTY_ACTIVITYACCUMULATOR DUTYACT ON DUTY.ID = DUTYACT.FK_DUTY
JOIN FLYINGACTIVITY FLYACT ON DUTYACT.ID = FLYACT.FK_ACTIVITYACCUMULATOR
WHERE FLYACT.Type = 'DEADHEAD'
AND CREWONFLIGHT.ACTIVITYTYPECODE NOT IN ('DHD','TVL')
AND CREWONFLIGHT.REMOVED = 'false'
) DHD ON CREW.STAFFNUMBER = DHD.STAFFNUMBER AND
FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTDATE = DHD.FLIGHTDATE AND
FLIGHTLEG.DEPARTUREAIRPORTCODE = DHD.DEPARTUREAIRPORTCODE AND
FLIGHTLEG.ARRIVALAIRPORTCODE = DHD.ARRIVALAIRPORTCODE AND
FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTNUMBER = DHD.FLIGHTNUMBER
WHERE FLIGHTLEG.FLIGHTLEGSTATUS = 'SCHEDULED'
AND CREWONFLIGHT.REMOVED = 'false'
AND DHD.STAFFNUMBER IS NULL
/* AND CREWONFLIGHT.ACTINGPOSITIONCODE = FUNCTION.FUNCTIONCODE */
-- AND FUNCTION.EXPIRYDATE >= SYSDATE
AND FLIGHTKEY.FLIGHTDATE >= TO_DATE('01/05/19', 'DD/MM/YY') AND ROWNUM <= 1
